mapper.select: select tvmmSeq , tvmmName , tvmmPassword , tvmmDob , tvmmZipCode , tvmmAddress1 , tvmmAddress2 , tvmmAddressFull , tvmmEmailAccount , tvmmEmailDomain , tvmmEmailDomainCd , tvmmTelecomCd , tvmmAdminNy , tvmmHostNy , tvmmDesc from tvMember where 1 = 1 and tvmmDelNy = 0 and tvmmHostNy = 1
